propertyDescriptor.name: MCCContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the path to the container holding the primary MCC Study with aggregated data. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/mcc'

propertyDescriptor.name: MCCRequestContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the path to the container used to manage MCC animal requests. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/mcc'

propertyDescriptor.name: MCCInternalDataContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the path to the container parent for the internal MCC Studies, each with raw data. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/mcc'

propertyDescriptor.name: MCCContactUsers
propertyDescriptor.description: This is a comma separated list of LabKey user names of users that should be notified by email when requests for help or user access are submitted through MCC.

propertyDescriptor.name: MCCRequestNotificationUsers
propertyDescriptor.description: This is a comma separated list of LabKey user names of users that should be notified by email when requests for help or user access are submitted through MCC.

propertyDescriptor.name: ZIMSImportPath
propertyDescriptor.description: The absolute path to a folder holding the XML files from a ZIMS export. This is expected to either be the top-level folder, or the ./Animal subfolder.
